comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: Lock the thread that's not self moderated, open a new one that is self moderated and be done. Moderators may be able to make a thread self moderated for you but I don't think so.

comments.author: jackg
comments.body: If you can, move the old thread to archival to keep the board less cluttered (or change the name of it if you can't).Mods can't make a thread self moderated after it's been made.
